text: #HerdImmunity is needed to stop #COVID19. BUT, we don’t know how long #Immunity, acquired from #infection or the #covidvaccine, will last. So, how can we say that those who recover from #Covid_19 also need the #vaccine? How do we know this will offer “better” #protection? 💉😷🧼 https://t.co/CuF7IKq5Bo
